articles.title: Watch: Monkeypox Explained: Causes, Symptoms and Treatment | Hot Mic with Nidhi Razdan
articles.description: Hot Mic with Nidhi Razdan: The world is still reeling from Covid and now we have a new health crisis to deal with. Over the weekend, the World Health Organisation, or the WHO, declared Monkeypox a global health emergency.
